page.title: 04Tesco Superstore, Hollington
page.content: Tesco's is a large{superstore}near to the Hollington Estate. It opened in 1982.It sells almost anything from {food to shoes.}There is a record department, gardening, household and toy sections. There is a wide choice of clothes which are quite fashionable and reasonable. Children in our school buy lots of their clothes here.You can obtain all kinds of food there are special vegetable,fruit,fish and bakery departments. There are 32 checkouts, one is wider for disabled people.In the self-service{restaurant you can buy dinners, snacks, drinks. There are big{car parks,}so it is usually easy to find a space. We counted how many cars came to Tesco's from 10.15 to 10.30 each day..Mon.80 Tues.78. Wed 86. Thurs 75. Fri.96. There were nearly 300 already parked. A Gulf{petrol}station is by the exit.
